name: Validate Search Course functionality on Edureka website

elements.name: Verify scarch navigation and course details for valid course

steps.name: The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened
I click on the Search course bar
I enter a Big Data in the search input field
The search results page should be displayed
I click on Big Data Hadoop Certification Training Course from the search results
The course details page should be displayed

elements.name: Verify navigating through Popular Courses and applying filters

steps.name: The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened
I click on the Search course bar
I click on aws technology
The user clicks on Job Role
Select filter from AWS page
The page should display Cloud Devops courses
The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened
I click on the Search course bar
I enter course name from sheet 0 and row 0
Search results page should be displayed
The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened
I click on the Search course bar
I enter course name from sheet 0 and row 1
Search results page should be displayed
The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened
I click on the Search course bar
I click on DevOps
I click on View Details
I click on Times Now
Times Now Article is visible
The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened
I click on the Search course bar
I click on Artificial Intelligence
I click on Sitejabber review button
I enter website name from sheet 1 and row 0
